TextView.android:text: Xi Jinping made an important speech at the meeting, summarized the economic work in 2018, analyzed the current economic situation, and deployed the economic work in 2019. In his speech, Li Keqiang made specific plans for economic work next year and made a concluding speech. The meeting held that this year is the beginning of the full implementation of the spirit of the Nineteenth National Congress of the Party. Under the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as its core, the whole Party and the whole country have implemented the strategic plan made at the Nineteenth National Congress of the CPC, adhered to the general tone of the work of striving for progress in a stable way, responded effectively to the profound changes in the external environment in accordance with the requirements of high-quality development, worked hard to meet difficulties, and accomplished the objectives of macro-control well. The three major offensive battles have begun well, and structural reform on the supply side has been deepened. We have stepped up reform and opening up, steadily dealt with Sino-US economic and trade frictions, continued improvement of people's lives, sustained and healthy economic development and social stability, and taken new steps towards the goal of building a well-off society in an all-round way. Achievements are hard won.
